channel.title: Hugo on Introduction
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Introduction

item.title: Deploying This Site to Github Pages
item.description: The Start of this Site A while ago I joined a lot of developer and tech communities and noticed that there’s a lot of people building really nice personal websites, so I thought I should probably do the same. I’ve never been a super creative or visual person and have carved out my career as more of a backend engineer. So I decided to go with a static site generator and had some familiarity with Hugo.
